navigation.postTitle: Full Stack Web Developer && Content Writer

hero.title: Hi, I'm ADAM Abdel-Djamal
hero.content: I'm a passionate Full Stack Web Developer. I build fast, accessible, and modern web applications using Vue.js, Laravel, and cutting-edge tools.

about.title: About Me
about.content: With a strong academic background and hands-on experience in both frontend and backend, I deliver efficient and scalable solutions. I enjoy transforming ideas into interactive applications that users love.
